INSERT INTO sku_stock (product_id, sku_code, price, stock, low_stock, sale, sp_data) VALUES
(#{item.productId, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.skuCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.price, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.stock, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.lowStock, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.sale, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.spData, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
